name: TechinSports
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Every episode, Paolo, Mandy, and Alex talk about the hottest news in sports tech, followed by answering the question, ‘can technology help you win?’. Plus, don’t miss Paolo’s incredibly difficult trivia! So sit back, don’t panic, because the 3rd stringers are coming into the game!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
